column6: CURSE OF THE MUTANTS PART 3 In a desperate bid to fend off an endless horde of vampires, the X-Men resurrect Dracula. Will the former Lord of the Vampires go along with Cyclops' scheme to take down Dracula's upstart son, Xarus?
